::Squizzy::

The pod lid opened and revealed a 5 foot tall, female bot inside, 
still unconsious.  Her sleek, slender form with polished crome, 
laying motinless in the pod.  The program panel lights blinking and 
flashing at the top of the head rest in the pod.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, wilddance_mare@h... wrote:
> Rattrap:
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Rattrap was again on his own trail, forgetting about the wolf-bot 
and 
> the Predacon that was in pursuit. He wasn't going to risk his hide. 
> So, he went on, going in do place in peticular--until his noise 
> grabbed his attention. He lifted his head and sniffed the air. He 
> smelt something familiar. A stasis pod (squizzy's). Instinct 
dragged 
> him to it, following his noise until he found it.
> 
> He glaced at it carefully, and approached it by the side where the 
> panel was. He stood up on two legs.
> 
> "Hello?" He tapped a button on it.
